actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: To preclude the acceptance of a driver's license as a document establishing identity, for purposes of employment eligibility verification, if the State issuing the license permits use of a taxpayer identification number that is not a social security account number in the application process.

summary.text: State Accountability in Licensing Act - Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide that if a state permits an applicant for a driver's license or document to use a taxpayer identification number that is not a social security account number the license or document may not be used to verify identity under the employment verification system.

titles.title: To preclude the acceptance of a driver's license as a document establishing identity, for purposes of employment eligibility verification, if the State issuing the license permits use of a taxpayer identification number that is not a social security account number in the application process.
